Software Engineer in Dubai

We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team in Dubai. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in Python and cloud technologies.

Responsibilities include designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications. You will work closely with other engineers and product managers to deliver high-quality software.

Requirements: - Strong proficiency in Python - Experience with AWS or similar cloud platforms - Excellent problem-solving skills - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

This is a great opportunity for someone who wants to work on cutting-edge technology in a fast-paced environment. We offer competitive salary and benefits.

Apply now to join our growing team!
